segments.text: I should tell you that I'm checking out in about 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm ready when you are , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good ! Now , it's still morning here in New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are so right , sir . The clock just struck nine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to spend some time exploring the city . What can I do with my luggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , right here we have a storage site . Its only $ 5 an hour , but you need to leave a deposit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A deposit ? Isn't my luggage a deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir , but it isn't . Your MasterCard or VISA will take care of things nicely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Let me think about this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sir . But don't take too long . You only have 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
